#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int count(int N)
{
	int c = 0;
	while (N != 0)
	{
		if (N%2 != 0)
			c++;
		N /= 2;
	}
	return c;
}

int main()
{
	int N;
	scanf("%d", &N);
	printf("%d\n", count(N));
	return 0;
}
